name: COVID-19 Hospital Needs and Death Projections
description: Referenced in a White House press briefing as the 'Chris Murray Model,' IHMEâ€™s COVID-19 projections show demand for hospital services in each state. The demand for these services is expected to exceed capacity. Please send questions to covid19@healthdata.org.
